mobs.long_desc: A small hairy humanoid stands here, apparently trying to hide.
mobs.desc: You realize that the small hairy humanoid is not trying to hide from you; it's just permanently hunched over. Small, yet fast, the small humanoid looks like it could be capable of anything as it stares at you with its piercing green eyes. Don't keep staring at them. You might lose your grip on this world.

mobs.long_desc: A living creature of black flame flits about the area.
mobs.desc: The way it flits about, to and fro, all about you leads you to the undeniable conclusion that it, whatever it is, is definitely alive. About as tall as your fore-arm and half as wide, the ghostly black flame seems to have no need of a conventional fuel source and creates no light of its own. If anything, this creature seems to feed on light. Odd.

mobs.keywords: nabaal round rubbery four legged creature
mobs.long_desc: A round, rubbery, four legged creature stands here, growling fiercely.
mobs.desc: It stands about 4 foot tall and 5 foot wide. Its 4 large clawed feet securely planted on the ground, the creature growls menacingly at you. You're not quite sure what it plans to do with you after it kills you, but you're sure it wants to kill you. Perhaps it thinks of you as a light snack?

mobs.long_desc: A coherent pillar of slime oozes by, sloshing as it moves.
mobs.desc: Its twisted, barely coherent form bubbles and oozes sickeningly. Anywhere from 3 to 10 eyes bubble to the top of the creature and sink back inside at any one time, apparently watching you and everything else going on nearby. From time to time, a tendril of ooze will form and swat at some unseen object. Better watch out. The next swat could land on you!

mobs.long_desc: A small rodent-sized creature floats in a mini-tornado here.
mobs.desc: The small hairy creature has disproportionately huge gnarly fangs. Although you might think it's harmless at first, you now get the feeling that once it springs into action, it might be more than a match for the likes of you!

mobs.long_desc: A small flame-red newt scurries about here.
mobs.desc: It's small, but dangerous looking. It looks to be supernatural in origin as its body is definitely partially composed of fire. Whatever it is, it doesn't look to be mature. You'd probably not want to see what it looks like when it's all grown up and even more dangerous than it is now.

mobs.long_desc: A large red salamander basks in the heat here.
mobs.desc: It's a huge, 8 foot long salamander! It's hard to tell if its bright red colouring is completely natural or whether it has absorbed some kind of magick. Perhaps it's simply the heat down here radiating from its body.

mobs.long_desc: A small pillar of flame dances about the room.
mobs.desc: It definitely appears to be sentient, whatever it is. Fortunately, it's not all that big so hopefully it isn't all that dangerous either. One thing that you're sure of is that it's definitely not an innocent natural occurrence!

mobs.keywords: giant fire huge red humanoid fire-giant
mobs.long_desc: A huge red humanoid stands here, ready to pound you into a bloody pulp!
mobs.desc: The humanoid stands about 18 foot tall, towering above you. It doesn't look any too friendly. You suddenly realize that maybe this is not the best place to be as the giant creature looks at you irritably and announces its plans to make you into a small pancake.

mobs.long_desc: A rotund slimy looking red humanoid stands here, eyeing you warily.
mobs.desc: Fat and slimy looking, the humanoid creature before you is covered in its own drool. The hunger in its eyes looks to be insatiable and you realize that you could be its next meal. Despite its grotesquely swollen body, the creature is obviously very powerful and capable of killing its next meal..

mobs.long_desc: A shiny red humanoid stands here, watching you coldly.
mobs.desc: Standing about 7 feet tall, the shiny red humanoid watches you coldly. The hatred emanating from its pure black eyes is chilling to behold. You are sure that it could and would kill you without feeling the slightest bit of remorse. Lean, yet muscular, the humanoid creature looks almost elegant, in a demonic sort of way.

mobs.long_desc: A man floats here, garbed all in red.
mobs.desc: A tall, lanky man is floating here. He is garbed all in bright red, the colour of the fire gods he worships.

mobs.keywords: priest high-fire-priest man flaming-red-eyes fire-high-priest high-priest-fire
mobs.long_desc: A man with flaming red eyes floats here.
mobs.desc: Tall and muscular, the high fire priest could probably pass for a human. Unless you looked into his eyes. His eyes are full of fire and dance with his utterly evil purposes.

mobs.keywords: emmath firehand fire man pyromancer Questmaster
mobs.long_desc: A man holding a ball of flame stands here.
mobs.desc: Emmath Firehand has certainly earned his name.  He is a master of the fiery arts, and holds a small ball of flame suspended above his hand.  He is dressed in all orange, yellow and red, appearing to be a living flame himself.  The deep orange color of his eyes glows, starkly contrasting to his dress and the rock walls around him.

objects.ground: There is a redwood staff here.

extras.text: This is a fine looking staff carved from the finest redwood you've ever had the pleasure of seeing.  Its the kind of staff you'd expect an up-and-coming mage, druid, or cleric to keep handy.

objects.ground: A glittering ruby ring lies on the ground here.

extras.text: The ring has been formed of some mysterious reddish metal, the likes of which you are unfamiliar with.  A glittering ruby has been set in the ring.

objects.ground: A red headband lies crumpled on the ground.

extras.text: This headband is made of fine red threads which feel slightly sticky.

objects.ground: A bright red robe lies crumpled on the ground here.
There are a pair of red boots on the ground here.

extras.text: The red boots are made of an odd material you're not familiar with. Nevertheless, they hold a high shine and look to be both warm and very comfortable.

objects.ground: A piece of beef jerky gathers dust here.

extras.text: This is a fairly sizable, and rather salty looking, piece of jerky.

objects.ground: A red oil lantern is sitting on the floor.

extras.text: Other than the fact that the lantern is larger than normal and is made from an odd reddish metal, there is nothing particularly unusual about the lantern. You would imagine it has a long life though.

objects.ground: A vial containing a red potion tempts you.

extras.text: The strange looking vial holds a bright red magical liquid.

objects.ground: A starmail vest lies here, under a layer of dust.

extras.text: The vest is comprised of interlocked star-shaped pieces of metal sewn to a thick vest of leather.  The concept seems similar to that of ringmail, at least to the untrained eye.  You imagine that this vest might be slightly tougher than your average ringmail, although it does not appear to be magical in any way.

objects.ground: A reddish metallic bracelet is on the floor here.

extras.text: It looks very light-weight and definately has a magical aura about it.  The strange reddish metal is unlike anything you're used to.

objects.ground: A ball of flame rests here on the ground.

extras.text: A small ball of flame glows, lighting the surroundings.

objects.ground: A small pillar of white fire flickers here.

extras.text: The fire seems at the same time both large, yet small, hot yet cold. Strangely, you are able to pick it up in your hand.  Its brightness is nearly unbearable to look at, but somehow seems to cast a cool glow across the area.

objects.ground: A small pillar of gray flame flickers here.

extras.text: The fire seems at the same time both large, yet small, hot yet cold. Strangely, you are able to pick it up in your hand.  Its luminosity is both too bright and too dim, yet seems to light the area perfectly.

triggers.name: quest_pyro_dooropen
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case s case se return 0 halt done return 1 wsend %actor% &bSomething doesn't seem quite right here...&0 wait 1s wsend %actor% You feel a sharp gust of air suck at you as a wall to the east opens. wechoaround %actor% A sharp gust of wind sucks around %actor.name%'s feet. wait 1s wsend %actor% You suddenly feel yourself being pulled into the opening! wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% suddenly is pulled into the opening! wat 5220 wecho A shift in the flamewall allows %actor.name% to pop through. wdoor 5219 east room 5220 wforce %actor.name% east wait 1 wecho The wall closes again as if it were never there. wdoor 5219 east purge

triggers.name: quest_pyro_exit
triggers.commands: wecho Emmath Firehand sighs loudly. wecho Emmath Firehand says, 'Oh very well, I suppose it is time you left anyway.' wecho Emmath Firehand grumbles incoherently about something or other. wait 1s wecho Emmath Firehand opens the flamewall with a wave of his hand. wdoor 5220 west flags a wechoaround %actor% Emmath Firehand pushes %actor.name% through the flamewall. wsend %actor% Emmath Firehand pushes you through the flamewall. wforce %actor% west wait 3s wecho Emmath Firehand says, 'I think you all should leave as well.' wait 2s wecho Emmath Firehand says, 'You had your chance, now it will just be more work for both of us for you to leave.' wait 1s wecho The flamewall reseals itself. wdoor 5220 west flags abcd

triggers.name: pyromancer_subclass_quest_emmath_greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %wandstep% eval minlevel (%wandstep% - 1) * 10 if %actor.level% >= %minlevel% if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:greet]% == 0 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I see you're crafting something.  If you want my help, we can talk about &6&b[upgrades]&0.' else if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:wandtask1]% && %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:wandtask2]% && %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:wandtask3]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I sense you're ready!  Let me see the staff.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you have what I need for the %weapon%?' endif endif endif endif set stage %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% switch %stage% case 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Come back to try again have you?  Only the best and most motivated of mages will complete the quest I lay before you.' smile wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'However, I am sure it is in you, if it is truly your desire, to complete this &1&bquest&0 and become a pyromancer.' break case 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Are you ready to finish listening now?  I once controlled all three parts of the flame: &7&bWhite&0, &bGray&0, and &9&bBlack&0.' wait 2s frown msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But one of them was taken from my &1&bcontrol&0.' wait 1s sigh break case 3 case 4 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you have the %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% flame?  Give it here!' break default if %actor.class% /= Sorcerer switch %actor.race% case dragonborn_frost case arborean halt break default if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 mecho Emmath Firehand's glowing eyes flash brightly for a moment. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Some love the life of &1&bflame&0.  Do you?' emote flicks a grin around the room. elseif %actor.class% /= Sorcerer && %actor.level% < 10 emote stares in amazement at %actor.name%. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I have no idea how you found me but you are far too inexperienced to be in these tunnels in the first place, and even less to ask for my guidance.' endif done endif done

triggers.name: pyromancer_subclass_quest_emmath_speech1
triggers.argument_list: flame? flames? life? flame flames life
triggers.commands: if %actor.class% /= Pyromancer wait 2 chuckle msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I have nothing more to teach you, young one.' elseif !%actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% if %actor.class% /= Sorcerer switch %actor.race% case dragonborn_frost case arborean if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to pyromancer.&0 halt endif break default wait 2 if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 nod %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you wish to become one with the flame, becoming a mage of fire?' elseif %actor.level% < 10 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Not yet, for you are still an initiate.  Come back when you have gained more experience.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Unfortunately you are too dedicated to your universalist ways for me to teach you now.' endif done else wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Sorry, I cannot help you learn the ways of the flame.' endif endif

triggers.name: pyromancer_subclass_quest_emmath_speech2
triggers.commands: if !%actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% && %actor.class% /= Sorcerer if %speech% /= yes if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 switch %actor.race% case dragonborn_frost case arborean msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to Pyromancer.&0 halt break default wait 2 quest start pyromancer_subclass %actor.name% Pyr nod msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Only the best and most motivated of mages will complete the &1&bquest&0 I lay before you.' smile wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'However, I am sure it is in you, if it is truly your desire, to complete this quest and become a pyromancer.' wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You may ask about your quest &1&b[subclass progress]&0 at any time.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Don't ask me to repeat myself though.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I hate that.' done elseif %actor.level% < 10 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Come back to me once you've gained more experience.' elseif %actor.level% > 45 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Unfortunately you are too dedicated to your universalist ways for me to teach you now.' endif else wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Very well, then begone from here.  I suppose you do not have it in you to be a mage of fire anyway.' msend %actor% Emmath places his fiery palm in the air, making the room glow brightly. mechoaround %actor% Emmath raises his palm into the air, making the room very bright. msend %actor% The air around you wavers. mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% suddenly disappears at Emmath's command. mteleport %actor% 5191 mat 5191 mforce %actor% look endif endif

triggers.name: pyromancer_subclass_quest_emmath_speech3
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% == 1 quest advance pyromancer_subclass %actor.name% if %actor.align% >= 350 set part white elseif %actor.align% <= -350 set part black else set part gray endif quest variable pyromancer_subclass %actor.name% part %part% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I seem to have a problem now, because some time ago...' emote sighs, looking troubled. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It is just...' wait 1s mecho &0msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, part of the essence of fire is no longer under my power.' emote shakes his head sadly. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I once controlled all three parts of the flame: &7&bWhite&0, &bGray&0, and &9&bBlack&0.' wait 2s frown msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But one of them was taken from my &1&bcontrol&0.' wait 1s sigh elseif %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% > 1 grumble wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I already told you about the quest.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Part of the flame is no longer under my &1&bcontrol&0.  You should remember that much.' endif

triggers.name: pyromancer_subclass_quest_emmath_speech4
triggers.argument_list: control controlled control? controlled? taken taken?
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% == 2 quest advance pyromancer_subclass %actor.name% nod %actor.name% elseif %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% > 2 roll msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I already told you once.' wait 2s sigh endif if %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% >= 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes, I once had control over all three fire elements.' emote again shakes his head sadly. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But the %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% flame was taken from me.' look %actor.name% wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'To truly help, I suggest you stop loitering and go recover it.' ponder wait 2s switch %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% case white set place &bin some kind of mine&0 break case black set place &bin some kind of temple&0 break case gray default set place &bnear some kind of hill&0 done msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Last I heard, it was &6&b%place%&0, or something of the like.' emote mutters something about the villainy of it all. wait 3s eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Are you still here?  You should leave now.' endif

>= 0 && %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% <= 3 set flameball_item yes endif elseif %object.vnum% == 5211 if %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% > 0 && %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% set subclass_item yes if %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% == gray set right_item yes endif elseif %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% >= 0 && %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% <= msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Goodness the spirit of the flame is complete once again!' shake %actor.name% grin wait 2s quest complete pyromancer_subclass %actor.name% mforce %actor% subclass else I have not even told you what the quest is yet...' break default msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'What a lovely gift, it will fit nicely on my shelf.' thank %actor.name% wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Shame you were not performing a quest, you seem like a friend of fire.' done elseif %flameball_item% if %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% == 1 return 0 wait 2 frown msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But I didn't even tell you what I wanted yet!' mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'How do you expect to gain power like this?' elseif %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% == 2 if ((%object.vnum% == 5211) || (%object.vnum% == 5212) || (%object.vnum% == 17308)) if %actor.quest_variable[emmath_flameball:%object.vnum%]% != 1 eval count 1 + %actor.quest_variable[emmath_flameball:count]% quest variable emmath_flameball %actor.name% count %count% quest variable emmath_flameball %actor.name% %object.vnum% 1 else return 0 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You have already brought me %object.shortdesc%!' mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif if %count% wait 2 mjunk questobject switch %count% case 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Excellent. triggers.name: pyro_subclass_flameball_emmath_status

Pay attention!' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'The %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% flame was taken from me. look %actor.name% wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'To truly help, I suggest you stop loitering and go recover it.' ponder wait 2s switch %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% case white set place &bin some kind of mine&0 break case black set place &bin some kind of temple&0 break case gray default set place &bnear some kind of hill&0 done msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Last I heard, it was &6&b%place%&0, or something of the like.' break default if %actor.has_completed[pyromancer_subclass]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You're already a pyromancer you ninny.' else switch %actor.race% case dragonborn_frost case arborean if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 msend %actor% &1Your race may not subclass to pyromancer.&0 halt endif break default if %actor.level% >= 10 && %actor.level% <= 45 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You aren't working to be a pyromancer.' elseif %actor.level% < 10 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Not yet, for you are still an initiate.  Come back when you have gained more experience.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Unfortunately you are too dedicated to your universalist ways for me to teach you now.' endif done endif done

triggers.name: Flameball quest status checker
triggers.commands: wait 2 switch %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% case 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you still seek this ball of flame?' ponder wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, to hold it in your palm...  You would need to prove your worth for such power.' emote looks thoughtful for a moment. break case 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You need to show mastery over the fire.' emote pulls out his well-used thinking cap, and begins to think. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring me the three parts of flame: &7&bWhite&0, &bGray&0, and &9&bBlack&0.  I think we can talk again then.' set black %actor.quest_variable[emmath_flameball:17308]% set white %actor.quest_variable[emmath_flameball:5211]% set gray %actor.quest_variable[emmath_flameball:5212]% if %black% || %white% || %gray% mecho mecho You have brought me: if %white% mecho - &7&b%get.obj_shortdesc[5211]%&0 endif if %gray% mecho - &b%get.obj_shortdesc[5212]%&0 endif if %black% mecho - &9&b%get.obj_shortdesc[17308]%&0 endif endif mecho mecho I still need: if !%white% mecho - &7&b%get.obj_shortdesc[5211]%&0 endif if !%gray% mecho - &b%get.obj_shortdesc[5212]%&0 endif if !%black% mecho - &9&b%get.obj_shortdesc[17308]%&0 endif wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well?  Go on, then!' break case 3 peer %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Didn't we talk about this already?' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring me the renegade &4&bblue flame&0!' break default msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'What quest?  You don't work for me.' done

triggers.name: Emmath blue flame receive
triggers.commands: mat 23890 m_run_room_trig 23814 * flameball if %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% == 2 && %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% != %step% wait 2 mjunk blue-flame eye msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I didn't ask you to bring me this yet.' msend %actor% %self.name% extinguishes %get.obj_shortdesc[23822]%. elseif %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball]% == 3 wait 2 mjunk blue-flame msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah yes... the blue flame.' smile self wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Such a pity to destroy such an artifact as this.' emote pauses momentarily. wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But it must be done.' wait 1s emote crushes the blue flame in his hand, its essence evaporating into the air. wait 2s lick wait 2s look %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well now I suppose I owe you something, don't I.  You seem ready for the power.' quest erase emmath_flameball %actor.name% wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But remember!  With great power, comes great responsibility.' mload obj 5210 give ball %actor.name% endif * phase wand if %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% eval minlevel (%step% - 1) * 10 if %actor.level% < ((%step% - 1) * 10) return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You'll need to be at least level %minlevel% before I can improve your bond with your weapon.' halt elseif %actor.has_completed[%type%_wand]% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You already have the most powerful %type% %weapon% in existence!' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% < %step% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Your %weapon% isn't ready for improvement yet.' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %step% set stage %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task2]% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You already gave me this.' else quest variable %type%_wand %actor% task2 1 wait 2 mjunk %object% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'This is just what I need.' wait 1s set job1 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task1]% set job2 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task2]% set job3 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task3]% if %job1% && %job2% && %job3% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Let me prime the %weapon%.' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Now finish practicing with your %weapon%.' endif endif endif endif

triggers.name: Emmath staff receive
triggers.commands: eval minlevel (%step% - 1) * 10 if %actor.level% < ((%step% - 1) * 10) return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You'll need to be at least level %minlevel% before I can improve your bond with your weapon.' halt elseif %actor.has_completed[%type%_wand]% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You already have the most powerful %type% %weapon% in existence!' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% < %step% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Your %weapon% isn't ready for improvement yet.' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %step% set stage %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task4]% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I already primed your %weapon%.' else set job1 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task1]% set job2 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task2]% set job3 %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:task3]% if %job1% && %job2% && %job3% set room %get.room[%task4%]% quest variable %type%_wand %actor% task4 1 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% utters eldritch incantations over %object.shortdesc%. wait 2s mecho %object.shortdesc% begins to crackle with supreme elemental power! wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Now that you've captured the demon's energies, you must make your way deep into the elementals planes.  There, in the full glory of elemental %type%, find %room.name% and &6&bimbue&0 it with the power of the plane.' wait 6s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It will forge the most powerful %weapon% of %type% in all the realms!' give all %actor% else return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s if !%job1% eval remaining ((%actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% - 1) * 50) - %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:attack_counter]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You still need to attack %remaining% more times to fully bond with your %weapon%!' wait 1s endif if !%job2% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You have to give me %get.obj_shortdesc[%gem%]% first.' wait 1s endif if !%job3% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You still need to slay %get.mob_shortdesc[%task3%]%.' endif endif endif endif

triggers.name: Emmath receive decline
triggers.commands: switch %object.vnum% default if %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% > 0 && %actor.quest_stage[pyromancer_subclass]% <= 4 set response I asked you to bring me the %actor.quest_variable[pyromancer_subclass:part]% flame, not this nonsense. elseif %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %step% set response I can't craft with this! elseif %actor.quest_stage[emmath_flameball] > 1 set response You're supposed to be out collecting flames, not whatever this is. else set response Why are you bringing me this trash? endif done if %response% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, '%response%' endif

triggers.name: lava_death_trig
triggers.commands: wait 2 while %self.people% set dice1 %random.60% set dice2 %random.60% eval damage %dice1% + %dice2% set victim %random.char% if %victim% wdamage %victim% %damage% fire if %damdone% == 0 wechoaround %victim% A large lava bubble bursts near %victim.name%, but %victim.p% body absorbs the blast! wsend %victim% A large lava bubble bursts right next to you.  Luckily, you are well -protected. else wechoaround %victim% A large lava bubble bursts near %victim.name%, burning %victim.o%! (&1%damdone%&0) wsend %victim% A large lava bubble bursts right next to you - OUCH, that burns! (&1%damdone%&0) endif if %victim.quest_stage[meteorswarm]% == 3 &&%victim.quest_variable[meteorswarm:fire]% == 1 quest advance meteorswarm %victim% wait 1s wsend %actor% &1You feel your mastery over fire growing!&0 endif else halt end wait 2 s done

rooms.name: On a Ladder in a Fiery Hole
rooms.description: You are maintaining a precarious hold on some red-hot niches melted into the walls of this black obsidian pit.  Smoke and flames wash over you, making it difficult to remain here, but somehow you manage to keep your grip.  You can either climb up higher in the pit, or you can drop down to the fiery tunnels below.

Up.description: You some handholds you could use to climb up.

Down.description: You see the bottom of this fiery pit.

rooms.name: The Bottom of a Fiery Hole
rooms.description: You are standing at the bottom of a hole filled with smoke and flames. This is probably not the best place to take a rest.  It looks like you could possibly climb up if you can find good handholds further up.  However, the heat and fumes could quite possibly overwhelm you if you try.  To the south, there seem to be some tunnels.  It's hard to tell if they have been carved through the lava or if they might be natural phenomena.

South.description: You see what appears to be a lava tube.

Up.description: You some handholds you could use to climb up.

rooms.name: The Lava Tube
rooms.description: This appears to be a more-or-less naturally formed lava tube.  The lava tube continues on to the north and east from here.

North.description: You see a lava tube.

East.description: You see a lava tube.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Lava Bubble
rooms.description: The lava tube begins to widen here at the mouth of a huge chamber.  It would appear that a bubble got stuck in the lava here forming a large chamber immediately to the south.  The lava tube continues on to the north from here, or you can enter the bubble to the south.

North.description: You see a lava tube.

South.description: You see a section of the lava bubble.

rooms.name: The Lava Bubble
rooms.description: You can't help but marvel, at least a little bit, at the size of this bubble in the rock hard lava all around you.  However, the sound of scurrying creatures from all different directions should give you something else to be distracted by.  The bubble continues on to the east, south, and west from here. You can also leave the bubble to the north.

North.description: You see an exit from this lava bubble.

East.description: You see a section of the lava bubble.

South.description: You see a section of the lava bubble.

West.description: You see a section of the lava bubble.

rooms.name: The Lava Tunnels
rooms.description: You are standing in a tunnel carved out of the lava.  It would appear that someone, or something, has enlarged a naturally formed lava tube into a rather sizable tunnel.  The tunnel continues on to the north and south from here.

North.description: You see a lava tunnel.

rooms.name: The Chamber of Fire
rooms.description: This is an artificial offshoot of the natural lava tunnels around.  The rock is crispy red, much like the center of a living flame.  The walls even seem to waver, appearing to be burning.  There is a small stone shelf on the eastern wall, holding nothing.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Lava Cave
rooms.description: You are standing at the entrance to a huge cave, carved out of the lava. You can help but wonder what lives therein.  The cave is just to the west of here.  The lava tunnels continue on to the east.

East.description: You see a lava tunnel.

West.description: You see a section of the lava cave.

rooms.name: The Lava Cave
rooms.description: A mighty cave has been carved from the volcanic rock.  You can only shudder to think what kind of mighty beast would be strong enough to do this.  The sounds of primitive tools striking rock echo throughout the chamber.  This is surely not a safe place to dally.  The lava cave continues on to the north and west.  You can also retreat to the relative safety of the lava tunnels to the east of here.

North.description: You see a section of the lava cave.

East.description: You see an exit from this lava cave.

West.description: You see a section of the lava cave.

rooms.name: Near the Lava Ledge
rooms.description: You stand in a smallish tunnel.  Steam rolls in from the west and there looks to be a ledge off in the distance.  To the east, there is a small entrance into what appears to be a massive cave.

East.description: You see a section of the lava cave.

West.description: You see a slippery looking ledge.

rooms.name: The Ledge near the Wall of Steam
rooms.description: There is a solid wall of rolling steam to the west of here.  There also seems to be a ledge, so perhaps you shouldn't go that way unless you have wings..  You could also move deeper into the lava tunnels to the east.

East.description: You see a lava tunnel.

West.description: Nothing.

rooms.name: The Cracked Lava
rooms.description: You are moving about in a series of cracks and fissures in what would otherwise be solid volcanic rock.  It's not as tight a fit as you might imagine, but it's by no means comfortable.  You see navigable cracks to the west of here.  A largish tunnel can be seen through a crack to the south.

South.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

West.description: You see a tunnel through the crack in the lava.

East.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

South.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

West.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

rooms.name: The Cracked Lava
rooms.description: You are moving about in a series of cracks and fissures in what would otherwise be solid volcanic rock.  It's not as tight a fit as you might imagine, but it's by no means comfortable.  You see navigable cracks to the east and west of here.  To the north, a large polished hallway can be seen nearby.

North.description: You see a magnificent obsidian hallway.

East.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

West.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a highly polished, very definitely man-made, hallway.  The walls are of glimmering obsidian and appear to be flawless to the naked eye.  The hallway continues on to the north.  The south wall is cracked wide open and big enough for you to enter.

North.description: You see a magnificent obsidian hallway.

South.description: You see a crack in the wall large enough to enter.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Fire Temple
rooms.description: You are in a highly polished, very definitely man-made, hallway.  The walls are of glimmering obsidian and appear to be flawless to the naked eye.  The hallway continues on to the east and opens up into a magnificent, but evil, temple to the west.

East.description: You see a magnificent obsidian hallway.

West.description: You see the fire temple.

rooms.name: The Fire Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Fire Temple.  The glimmering obsidian walls, floors, ceiling, and pillars all glorify the "glory" of fire used to evil ends. The Fire Temple continues on to the north, south, and west.  You can leave the temple to the east.

North.description: You see the fire temple.

East.description: You see the fire temple.

South.description: You see the fire temple.

West.description: You see the fire temple.

North.description: You see the fire temple.

rooms.name: The Fire Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing at the Evil Fire Temple Altar.  The glimmering obsidian altar is covered with the ashes of the many sacrifices burned alive here to glorify the twisted evil of fire misused.  The Fire Temple continues on to the north, east, and south.  A small alcove is just west of here.

North.description: You see the fire temple.

East.description: You see the fire temple.

South.description: You see the fire temple.

West.description: You see a small alcove.

rooms.name: South of the Fire Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Fire Temple.  The glimmering obsidian walls, floors, ceiling, and pillars all glorify the "glory" of fire used to evil ends. The Fire Temple continues on to the east and south.  The Evil Fire Temple Altar is to the north.

North.description: You see the fire temple altar.

East.description: You see the fire temple.

South.description: You see the fire temple.

rooms.name: The Fire Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the evil Fire Temple.  The glimmering obsidian walls, floors, ceiling, and pillars all glorify the "glory" of fire used to evil ends. The Fire Temple continues on to the north and east.

North.description: You see the fire temple.

East.description: You see the fire temple.

rooms.name: Behind the Fire Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in a small alcove behind the Fire Temple Altar.  Perhaps this is where the evil priests prepare for their horrifying ceremonies.  The only exit from this alcove is to the east.

East.description: You see the fire temple.

South.description: There seems to be a slight crack in the wall.

rooms.name: The Fire Priest's Treasure Room
rooms.description: This is apparently where the treasures stolen from the many sacifices are stored.  I wouldn't let the High Priest find you back here.  Unless you are volunteering to be the next sacrifice!  The back of a secret door faces you to the north.  It should be easy to get out of here.

North.description: You see the back of a secret door.

South.description: Odd. There isn't any junk piled up against the wall.

rooms.name: Top of the Secret Lava Well
rooms.description: You are at the top of a well filled with molten lava.  Although you could descend, it probably wouldn't be a terribly smart thing to do!  The back of a secret door faces you to the north.  That would be a far safer way to leave this place.

North.description: You see the back of a secret door.

Down.description: Hard to tell. Too much lava bubbling up.

rooms.name: The Secret Lava Well
rooms.description: Nothing but lava below you.  You're not going any further down!  The only viable exit is up.  Better get moving along before you become extra crispy adventurer nuggets.

Up.description: A far safer place then here.

rooms.name: The Cracked Lava
rooms.description: You are moving about in a series of cracks and fissures in what would otherwise be solid volcanic rock.  It's not as tight a fit as you might imagine, but it's by no means comfortable.  You see navigable cracks to the north, east, and south of here.

North.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

East.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

South.description: There is a crack in the lava large enough to enter.

rooms.name: Near the Hissing Chamber
rooms.description: The lava cracks open up into a largish chamber to the east of here.  There is the unmistable sound of hissing coming from the chamber beyond.  It doesn't sound like a living sound, but it makes you uneasy nonetheless.  The lava cracks continue on to the south from here.

East.description: You see a large chamber. You hear hissing sounds.

South.description: You see a crack in the wall large enough to enter.

rooms.name: The Hissing Chamber
rooms.description: You are in a large, rock-filled chamber.  Fissures in the rock release a large variety of bad-smelling, and potentially dangerous, natural gases into the air all around you.  Even more distressing are the many small flames burning all around you.  Perhaps this is not a smart place to explore?  The hissing chamber continues on to the north and east.  You can also leave the chamber to the south and west.

North.description: You see a large chamber. You hear hissing sounds.

East.description: You see a large chamber. You hear hissing sounds.

South.description: You see a small chamber.

West.description: You see a small chamber.

North.description: You see a large chamber. You hear hissing sounds.

West.description: You see a crack in the wall large enough to enter.

rooms.name: The Lava Cave
rooms.description: A mighty cave has been carved from the volcanic rock.  You can only shudder to think what kind of mighty beast would be strong enough to do this.  The sounds of primitive tools striking rock echo throughout the chamber.  This is surely not a safe place to dally.  The lava cave continues on to the north and east from here.

North.description: You see a section of the lava cave.

East.description: You see a section of the lava cave.
